price: 10. Nabiyow keenih cus: teemene furrayna, ken mari diinik ken korsaamih meesih gablâ fanah kelitteeh tet orben waqdi, tokkel:Ni -Rabbow ku-xaquk nacrur neh acuyaay iimaanal diggi nee hayis, kaadu ni-caagid neh xabbacoysaay massa-le gital tirri nee hayis iyyen.
arabic: إِذۡ أَوَى ٱلۡفِتۡيَةُ إِلَى ٱلۡكَهۡفِ فَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَآ ءَاتِنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحۡمَةٗ وَهَيِّئۡ لَنَا مِنۡ أَمۡرِنَا رَشَدٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: idh awā al-fit'yatu ilā al-kahfi faqālū rabbanā ātinā min ladunka raḥmatan wahayyi lanā min amrinā rashadan
